news.title: Los Angeles Sherriff’s Department Investigating Sean “Diddy” Combs for Sexual Battery
news.summary: Police are looking to incidents that are alleged to have taken place in 2020 and 2021

news.title: Kneecap Address Mo Chara Terrorism Charge on New Song “No Comment”: Listen
news.summary: “‘No Comment’ is all about getting harassed by the British state,” the Irish trio said of the new collaboration with Sub Focus

news.title: Jeff Tweedy Announces 2026 Tour
news.summary: The Wilco frontman will continue to play shows in support of Twilight Override

news.title: Father John Misty Announces 2026 Tour Dates
news.summary: The singer-songwriter has additional shows in the United States and Europe in support of Mahashmashana

news.title: David Byrne and Brian Eno Reunite for New Song “T Shirt”: Listen
news.summary: Eno co-wrote the song, which Byrne has been playing on his tour behind Who Is the Sky?

news.title: Peaer Announce First Album Since 2019, Share New Song “Button”: Listen
news.summary: The indie-rock trio returns in January with Doppelgänger

news.title: Anjimile Shares New Song “Auld Lang Syne II”: Listen
news.summary: The folk singer-songwriter’s first new music since 2023

news.title: Ticket Resale for Profit to Be Outlawed in United Kingdom
news.summary: A long-promised government crackdown on touts and resale platforms is set to be unveiled this week
